    \begin{verbatim}
function [t,y] = L1Caputo(y_der,alpha,a,b,N)%,y0)

% 0 < alpha < 1
format long;
t = linspace(a,b,N+1);
y = diag(zeros(length(t)));
y(1) = 0;
%gamma(1)
for i=1:(N)%i=0:k, ale matlab čísluje od 1
    tau = t(i+1)-t(i);
    b_n = (tau^(-alpha))/(gamma(2-alpha))*((i+1)^(1-alpha)-i^(1-alpha));
    %y_der(t(i+1))
    y(i+1) = y(i) + b_n*(y_der(t(i+1))-y_der(t(i)));
    %tau * y_der(t(i),y(:,i));
end
plot(t,y)
hold on;
plot(t, 1.128379167*sqrt(t), 'k')
end
\end{verbatim}
